name: DLink | DxS | Security | Attack | Blat Attack (SYSLOG)

patterns.value_re: (?:CRIT:|CRIT\(2\)) Blat Attack is detected from \(IP: (?P<src_ip>\S+) Port: (?P<interface>\S+)\)$
